replace the standard HTML model of the web with a what what I would call a
thick client or a much more heavyweight JavaScript framework um and so rather
than managing a lot of code on the front end um a lot of JavaScript code I should

it generalizes what are known as Hyper media controls which are the funny things that make hyper media special and

encod has links and forms and so forth that allow you to interact with the
